**Description:**
The Department of Natural Resources Canada requires the development and maintenance of Canadian versions of the SmartWay tools, which were originally designed by the United States Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) for the North American market. The tools aim to encourage freight companies to make their operations as energy-efficient as possible by providing them with online calculators and resources to measure and reduce their greenhouse gas emissions.

**Key Requirements:**

- Develop French-language versions of the existing SmartWay tools, including the Online Ocean-Going Vessel (OGV) calculator, Truck, Logistics, Shipper
